Name: Darkness Looplet

Description: It has five notches. It enables the holder to participate in an Alliance even when the holder is far away from the leader. You can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

Description: It has three notches. It's one of the items invented by the legendary glutton team; the Never Hungries. You'll definitely want it for your adventure! The holder gets hungry half as much; even if it walks or uses an Alliance.

Name: Cover Looplet
Description: It has four notches. When a teammate with low HP is nearby; the holder receives the attack instead.

Name: Deflect Looplet
Description: It has four notches. It enables the holder to shrug off moves and pass them on to a nearby Pokémon. But the holder's Belly gets emptier every time it happens.

Name: Earth Looplet
Description: It has two notches. It's one of the Eight Treasures that only the strong are said to be able to obtain. It makes the holder immune to traps.

Name: Excavation Looplet
Description: It has four notches. If the leader holds it; items buried in the ground shine visibly.

Name: Explosive Looplet
Description: It has six notches. It sometimes explodes when the holder takes damage. It damages nearby Pokémon and makes items on the floor disappear.

Name: Gold Looplet
Description: It has four notches. It does nothing; but it can be sold for a high price!

Name: Grass Looplet
Description: It has three notches. It's one of the Eight Treasures that only the strong are said to be able to obtain. It makes all traps on the floor visible to the holder.

Name: Healing Looplet
Description: It has three notches. Doubles the passive HP regeneration when walking.

Description: It has five notches. It's one of the items invented by the legendary glutton team; the Never Hungries. You'll definitely want it for your adventure! Holding it is said to prevent you from getting hungry during an Alliance.

Description: It has one notch. The holder gains 1 experience point each turn; even when not battling.

Name: Boy Looplet
Description: It has one notch. Lookalike item for Joy Looplet. Equipping this will make you look like a Male; regardless of you gender!?

Name: Looplet
Description: It has three nothces. It's an ordinary looplet. Holding it has no effect; but you can add various effects by setting emeras on it.

Description: It has one notch. It's one of the Eight Treasures that only the strong are said to be able to obtain. It's said the holder has a 50% chance to not consume PP's when using a move.

Name: Nullify Looplet
Description: It has ten notches. It prevents the holder's Ability from working.

Name: Prosper Looplet
Description: It has five notches. Picking up Poke' from the ground heals all status conditions.

Name: Satiated Looplet
Description: It has two notches. It's one of the items invented by the legendary glutton team; the Never Hungries. You definitely want it for your adventure. Holding it is said prevents you from getting hungry by walking.

Name: Sea Looplet
Description: It has two notches. It's one of the Eight Treasures that only the strong are said to be able to obtain. It's said to reveal the locations of items and enemies on the entire floor if the leader holds it.

Name: Unity Looplet
Description: It has two notches. It warps the holder near it's teammates if they end up alone.

Description: It has four notches. Has a 10% chance to warp the holder to a random room at the end of their turn.

Description: It has four notches. It's one of the items invented by the legendary glutton team; the Never Hungries. You'll want it for your adventure! The holder gets twice as full as usual from eating.

Name: Toxic Orb

Name: Flame Orb
Description: Held: Inflicts Burn on the holder at the end of the turn. Activates after Burn damage would occur.

Name: Adrenaline Orb
Description: Makes wild Pokémon more likely to summon allies.  Held: increases the holder's Speed by one stage when affected by Intimidate.

Name: Align Orb
Description: It makes the HP of your party members equal the highest HP among you.

Name: All Dodge Orb
Description: Using it sharply boosts the evasiveness of your party on the floor.

Name: All Hit Orb
Description: User and team go into a Focus Energy status for a short time; raising the critical hit ratio.

Name: All Mach Orb
Description: Ups Movement Speed of all team members by one level.

Name: All Power Up Orb
Description: Greatly increases the Attack and Special Attack of all teammates on the floor.

Name: All Protect Orb
Description: Teammates on the floor get the Protect status and are protected from enemy attacks for a set number of turns dependent on the size of the team.

Name: Apathy Orb
Description: Using it creates the apathetic condition on the floor and makes enemy Pokémon drop any items they may have.

Name: Beatup Orb
Description: Draws all team members to the user.

Name: Blowback Orb
Description: Knocks a distant target flying. If the target hits a wall or another Pokémon; it sustains damage.

Name: Cleanse Orb
Description: Sticky; gummed-up items are cleansed of grime; making them usable again

Name: Decoy Orb
Description: Changes the status of the target to Decoy; making it the target of fellow Pokémon.

Name: Deposit Orb
Description: It sends a selected item to the Deposit Box.

Name: Drought Orb
Description: Drains water and magma from the dungeon floor.

Name: Emera Up Orb
Description: Using it adds 1 notch for an emera to a looplet. But the notch is available only during the adventure.

Name: Enemy Discord Orb
Description: Using it creates the Enemy Discord condition on the floor and makes enemy Pokémon unable to use an Alliance.

Name: Enemy Evolve Orb
Description: Using it evolves enemy Pokémon in the same room; but it has no effect on your teammates.

Name: Enemy Devolve Orb
Description: Using it devolves enemy Pokémon in the same room; but it has no effect on your teammates.

Name: Escape Orb
Description: An escape item that instantly warps the team out of the dungeon.

Name: Evasion Orb
Description: A stat-boosting item that raises the user's evasiveness by 1 level.

Name: Fill In Orb
Description: A landfill item that turns any water or lava in the floor into a solid wall.

Name: Foe Fear Orb
Description: An item that afflicts all enemies in the room with a Terrified status condition.

Name: Foe Hold Orb
Description: An item that afflicts all enemies on the floor with a Petrified status condition

Name: Foe Seal Orb
Description: An item that afflicts all enemies in the room with a Paused status condition.

Name: Hail Orb
Description: A climate-control item that changes the dungeon floor's weather to a Hail condition.

Name: Health Orb
Description: Using it heals bad status conditions; resets lowered stats of your party; and makes your party healthy. Being healthy prevents bad status conditions or a reduction in stats.

Name: Hurl Orb
Description: A weapon item that hurls the target toward a random enemy Pokémon to inflict damage.

Name: Identify Orb
Description: A sensor item that indicates if the Pokémon on the floor are holding items or not.

Name: Invisify Orb
Description: An item that gives the user an Invisible status. A Pokémon with the Invisible status is cloaked from view.

Name: Itemizer Orb
Description: A horrifying orb that turns the target Pokemon into an item. If it rebounds you will be turned into an item; so be careful!

Name: Lasso Orb
Description: Gathers and immobilizes enemy Pokémon in the same room into one place.

Name: Lob Orb
Description: A weapon item that inflicts damage on a target up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Longtoss Orb
Description: An item that gives Long Toss status to the user; which makes any item thrown by the user fly until it hits a wall or a Pokémon. It has no effect on thrown rocks.

Name: Luminous Orb
Description: A mapping item that reveals the entire floor to the user.

Name: Mobile Orb
Description: An item that gives a Mobile status to the user. A Pokémon with Mobile can move through walls and gullies and walk on lava and water.

Name: Monster Orb
Description: Using it changes the room to a Monster House.

Name: Mug Orb
Description: A weapon item that inflicts damage on the target; even at a distance. It also steals the target's hold item and makes it the user's. This added affect works only if the user is not holding an item.

Name: Nullify Orb
Description: Using it nullifies the Abilities of enemy Pokémon on the entire floor.

Name: Observer Orb
Description: Changes the status of the target to Paused; making it incapable of action.

Name: One Room Orb
Description: A destructive item that tears down all walls on the floor; turning the floor into one vast; open room. This might trigger Monster Houses so be careful!

Name: One Broom Orb
Description: Lookalike Item for One-Room Orb. Using this will spawn a broom that will sweep away every item from the entire floor!

Name: One Shot Orb
Description: A weapon item that has a 10% chance of instantly defeating the target in one shot.

Name: Petrify Orb
Description: An item that afflicts all enemies in the room with a Petrified status condition.

Name: Pierce Orb
Description: An item that gives Pierce status to the user; which makes any item thrown pierce through walls and all Pokémon it hits without stopping.

Name: Possess Orb
Description: If the leader is holding this item and it faints; it will cause an adjacent ally to faint instead; move the leader to its place; and fully restore leader's HP; PP and Belly.

Name: Pounce Orb
